statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-10 \, x^{3} + 35 \, x^{2} + 15 \, x - 27 , 5 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 4 , -20 \, x^{3} + 65 \, x^{2} + 25 \, x - 50 , -2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 3 , 6 \, x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 13\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
